programs.name: Sehat Sahulat Program (Qaumi Sehat Card)
programs.description: A flagship health insurance program providing free indoor hospital treatment to eligible families.
eligibility: Permanent resident of covered province (Punjab, KPK, Islamabad, etc)
programs.coverage: Up to PKR 1 Million per family per year in empaneled public/private hospitals.
programs.how_to_apply: SMS CNIC number to 8500 to check eligibility. Use CNIC as card at hospital.

programs.name: Expanded Programme on Immunization (EPI)
programs.description: Provides free vaccination against 12 vaccine-preventable diseases for children and pregnant women.
benefits: Vaccines for TB, Polio, Diphtheria, Pertussis, Tetanus, Hep B, Meningitis, Pneumonia, Measles, Typhoid
programs.coverage: Nationwide via Basic Health Units (BHUs) and vaccinators.
programs.how_to_apply: Visit nearest BHU, RHC or Govt Hospital. Keep Vaccination Card safe.

programs.name: Pakistan Bait-ul-Maal (Medical Assistance)
programs.description: Provides financial assistance to the poor for medical treatment.
programs.coverage: Payment made directly to the treating government hospital.
programs.how_to_apply: Submit application with medical reports and cost estimate to district Bait-ul-Maal office.

programs.name: Benazir Nashonuma Program
programs.description: Condition cash transfer program to address stunting and malnutrition.
programs.coverage: Select districts nationwide via Facilitation Centers.
programs.how_to_apply: Visit Nashonuma Center at Tehsil HQ Hospitals.

programs.name: Lady Health Worker (LHW) Program
programs.description: Door-to-door primary health care services provided by female community workers.
programs.how_to_apply: Contact local LHW in your neighborhood.

programs.name: TB Control Program
programs.description: Free diagnosis and treatment for Tuberculosis.
programs.coverage: All Govt Hospitals and selected private GP clinics.
programs.how_to_apply: Visit nearest TB center or Govt Hospital.

programs.name: Punjab Social Security (PESSI)
programs.description: Medical care for industrial workers and their dependents in Punjab.

programs.name: Hepatitis Prevention & Control Program
programs.description: Screening, vaccination and treatment for Hepatitis B and C.
programs.coverage: Provincial programs (e.g., Chief Minister's Hepatitis Program Sindh/Punjab).
programs.how_to_apply: Visit designated Hepatitis Sentinel Sites in DHQ Hospitals.

programs.name: Maternal, Newborn and Child Health (MNCH) Program
programs.description: Improving health outcomes for mothers and children.
programs.how_to_apply: Visit nearest RHC or THQ hospital.
